content.title: <TextStyle.Red>ðŸ‘‹ Welcome to ASGames Primal Chaos!</TextStyle>
content.text:
Welcome to ASGames Primal Chaos,  
 
 Please make a tribe 

 Daily Restarts are at 5:00 am CST 

 This server is a WIP; settings and mods are subject to change. 

 We use auto decay â€” if your tribe is offline for more than 7 days your dinos and structures will be auto-wiped. To check decay time on any structure or dino, target them with your crosshair and type /decaytime for the time remaining. 
 
 Structures that have less than 10 items will decay in 2 days (usually for unmanned taming pens).  

 ANY item that is the same as the recipe is disabled. 

 Do NOT use names like 123 or Human, and do NOT use profanity or derogatory names â€” these will be renamed.
 
 This is a US server. Please only speak English in General Chat.

content.title: <TextStyle.Red>Notes</TextStyle>
content.text:
By holding down the menu, you can select the EC guide for more information.

Structures take damage â€” build with that in mind. Don't build thatch houses.

content.title: <TextStyle.Blue>Rules</TextStyle>
content.text:
By playing on this server you consent to the rules laid out below: 
 
 - Do not use profanity in general chat; a filter is in place. 
 
 - Any items or exploits found that bypass mod progression will be removed immediately. Multiple infractions will result in a ban. 
 
 - Do not use derogatory or offensive names. Your character will be renamed. 
 
 - No excessive structure spam (pillars, foundations, etc.). 
 
 - No building or blocking caves, artifacts, or loot crates, or concentrated resource areas (6+ nodes). 
 
 - No blocking obelisks. 
 
 - No hacking or exploiting game bugs. 
 
 - No kiting dinos into bases to kill dinos or destroy structures. This results in an immediate ban. 
 
 - No blocking resource spawns or harassing with nearby structures. 
 
 - Random structures or 'spot holding' will cause ALL tribe structures to be wiped.

content.title: <TextStyle.Blue>Rules (Continued)</TextStyle>
content.text:
- Do not leave taming pens unattended; this counts as an extra structure and will result in a full wipe.

- One 50x50 base per tribe. Max height: 20 walls.

- Do NOT leave dinos out â€” use soulballs. Max 10 dinos out per tribe, except production dinos (e.g., gachas, breeders).

- No racism or bullying â€” zero tolerance.

- Do not give or trade high-tier items or tames to low-level players; they must earn progression themselves.

- Abusing any mechanic or bug may result in a ban.

- Wild teleporters must be public. Private teleporters will be limited to one per tribe.

- Do not leech boss fights or AOE loot events.

- Do not assist new players in obtaining eggs from wyvern trenches or similar content â€” they must do so independently.

- No breeding of genderless mod dinos (theyâ€™re too overpowered).

content.title: [Yellow]Gameplay & Progression[-]
content.text:
<TextStyle.White>Gliders help reduce fall damage.

The Upgrade Station allows upgrades only up to <TextStyle.Cyan>Journeyman</TextStyle>. For higher-tier blueprints, search loot drops or bosses.

The Blueprint Station is disabled.

Kill <TextStyle.Red>Shinies</TextStyle> to unlock Tek progression.

Most Tek Engrams unlock automatically at <TextStyle.Green>Level 120</TextStyle>.

Progress through drops and exploration â€” this server encourages organic advancement, not instant crafting.</TextStyle>

<TextStyle.Yellow>Drop & Gear Tips</TextStyle>

<TextStyle.White>âž¤ White/Green Drops: Starter gear and basic blueprints.
âž¤ Blue/Purple Drops: Journeyman gear and rare items.
âž¤ Yellow/Red Drops: Advanced or Tek-related blueprints.
âž¤ Bosses: Key source for Tek unlocks and late-game loot.

High-tier crafting and progression are balanced to keep gameplay challenging but rewarding.</TextStyle>

content.title: <TextStyle.Green>Information</TextStyle>
content.text:
For Consoles Discord link: https://discord.gg/eJsHn4mPRg

Donations-Shop link: https://chronsasastore.tebex.io/

For PC, press F3 for the shop.

50 points are earned every 30 minutes to purchase items from the shop.

Earn more points by donating. Use the Purchase Points button for the link.

If you have FPS issues, try these settings:
Press ` (above TAB) to open console:

r.VolumetricCloud 0
r.Fog 0
grass.enable 0
r.Streaming.PoolSize 0
r.Lumen.ScreenProbeGather.RadianceCache.ProbeResolution 16
r.DynamicGlobalIlluminationMethod 2
r.ShadowQuality 0

content.title: <TextStyle.Green>Donations</TextStyle>
content.text:
You can give donations by purchasing points.

Click 'Purchase Points' to go to our Tebex store.

In the store, click ARK SHOP ASCENDED, then select a package. Log in with your Steam account.

If purchasing a package or subscription, include your Discord name at checkout so roles can be assigned.

If purchasing points, use /redeem tbx-id in chat â€” you'll get your ID at checkout.

Points are instantly transferred once redeemed.

content.title: <TextStyle.Green>Settings</TextStyle>
content.text:
Settings are subject to change.

Max Dino Levels: 150
Player Levels: 130 (with Chibi 135)

Harvest: 3x
Taming: 3x
Mating Interval Multiplier: 1x
Egg Hatch Speed: 3x
Crop Growth Speed: 50x

Custom drops enabled.
